to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.impl

Class MessageListenerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.impl.MessageListenerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

     class MessageListenerThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    A Thread, that wait for data on input stream and converts it to a Message and tells it to the initiator.
    Author:
    sven
